name: year
text: Only the years weather_years are available (until we get a bigger hard-drive)

name: cf_exponent
full_name: Capacity factor exponent for spatial distribution of wind and solar
text: If exponent is 0 generators are distributed evenly across the region, if it is 1 they are distributed proportional to capacity factor, if it is x they are distributed proportional to (capacity factor)^x

name: location
text: Select from map above.

name: frequency
text: n-hourly, n<3 is very slow, big n solves faster (n=25 or n=49 give fast and relatively accurate results)

name: load
text: Demand should be large enough for utility-scale assets but small enough to neglect land availability constraints

name: methanol
full_name: Methanol storage (methanolisation for PtMeOH then Allam cycle for MeOHtP)

name: dispatchable1
text: Default assumption is based on open cycle natural gas turbine (OCGT)

name: dispatchable2
text: Default assumption is based on new nuclear EPR reactor in Europe

name: methanolisation_min_part_load
text: Private discussions.

name: methanolisation_efficiency
full_name: Methanol synthesis efficiency with respect to hydrogen
text: hydrogen input 1.161 MJ_H2/MJ_(CH3OH,LHV); Concave & Aramco. (2022). E-Fuels: A techno-economic assessment of European domestic production and imports towards 2050 (Concawe Report 17/22). Retrieved 12 April 2023, from https://www.concawe.eu/publication/e-fuels-a-techno-economic-assessment-of-european-domestic-production-and-imports-towards-2050/ , table 83.

name: methanolisation_co2
text: based on 0.0702 kgCO2/MJ_(CH3OH,LHV); Concave & Aramco. (2022). E-Fuels: A techno-economic assessment of European domestic production and imports towards 2050 (Concawe Report 17/22). Retrieved 12 April 2023, from https://www.concawe.eu/publication/e-fuels-a-techno-economic-assessment-of-european-domestic-production-and-imports-towards-2050/ , table 83.

name: methanolisation_electricity
text: based on 0.0499 MJ/MJ_(CH3OH,LHV); Concave & Aramco. (2022). E-Fuels: A techno-economic assessment of European domestic production and imports towards 2050 (Concawe Report 17/22). Retrieved 12 April 2023, from https://www.concawe.eu/publication/e-fuels-a-techno-economic-assessment-of-european-domestic-production-and-imports-towards-2050/ , table 83.

name: hydrogen_energy_cost
text: based on underground salt cavern storage CAPEX; based on cavern storage site with total 1 TWh storage volume considering all costs except for Surface Processing Unit costing 550 million EUR; INES (2023) https://energien-speichern.de/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/20231006_INES-Positionspapier_Vorschlaege-Marktrahmen_Entwicklung-H2-Speicher.pdf

name: hydrogen_energy_fom
unit: percent of overnight cost per year
full_name: Hydrogen gas storage fixed operation and maintenance costs
text: H21 NoE (2018) report https://www.h21.green/app/uploads/2019/01/H21-NoE-PRINT-PDF-FINAL-1.pdf , text below table 3-30

name: hydrogen_energy_lifetime
text: Danish Energy Agency, technology_data_catalogue_for_energy_storage.xlsx

name: hydrogen_compressor_cost
full_name: Hydrogen storage compressor and above-ground facilities capital cost (overnight)
text: for surface processing unit of 126MGBP with 1 GW_H2 i.e. 126 MGBP/1 GW_H2*1.08/1.02^3*2 where 1 GBP:1.08 EUR exchange rate and inflation adjustment for 3 years with 2%/a from 2018 to 2015 is done. Cost are doubled because low-input pressure for alkaline electrolysis requires two-stage compression scheme with double the amount of facilities; H21 NoE (2018) report https://www.h21.green/app/uploads/2019/01/H21-NoE-PRINT-PDF-FINAL-1.pdf , table 3-30 and text

name: hydrogen_compressor_fom
unit: percent of overnight cost per year
full_name: Hydrogen storage compressor and above-ground facilities fixed operation and maintenance costs
text: H21 NoE (2018) report https://www.h21.green/app/uploads/2019/01/H21-NoE-PRINT-PDF-FINAL-1.pdf , text below table 3-30

name: hydrogen_compressor_lifetime
full_name: Hydrogen storage compressor and above-ground facilities lifetime
text: Assume same value as for hydrogen_storage_tank_compressor

name: hydrogen_compressor_electricity
full_name: Hydrogen storage compressor and above-ground facilities electricity input
text: requiring with original report requiring 26.7 MW / 1000 MW_H2 of single stage compression; since alkaline electrolysis with low output pressure is assumed, assumed here twice the amount for two-stage compression; H21 NoE (2018) report https://www.h21.green/app/uploads/2019/01/H21-NoE-PRINT-PDF-FINAL-1.pdf , text below table 3-29

name: allam_cycle_cost
text: Assume 3x costs of CCGT based on [^mitchell2019], where CCGT is reported 556 gbp/kW, allam 1430 gbp with ASU and w/o ASU 1145.7 gbp, i.e. 2x as expensive as CCGT without the ASU costs; [^mitchell2019]: Mitchell, C., Avagyan, V., Chalmers, H., & Lucquiaud, M. (2019). An initial assessment of the value of Allam Cycle power plants with liquid oxygen storage in future GB electricity system. International Journal of Greenhouse Gas Control, 87, 1â€“18. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ijggc.2019.04.020

name: allam_cycle_cost
text: Assume 2x costs of CCGT based on [^mitchell2019], where CCGT is reported 556 gbp/kW, allam 1430 gbp with ASU and w/o ASU 1145.7 gbp, i.e. 2x as expensive as CCGT without the ASU costs; [^mitchell2019]: Mitchell, C., Avagyan, V., Chalmers, H., & Lucquiaud, M. (2019). An initial assessment of the value of Allam Cycle power plants with liquid oxygen storage in future GB electricity system. International Journal of Greenhouse Gas Control, 87, 1â€“18. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ijggc.2019.04.020

name: allam_cycle_cost
